# Tanmay Vaij - Full Stack & AI Engineer

> Portfolio website showcasing full-stack development, AI/ML projects, and technical expertise. Building innovative solutions with modern web technologies and AI frameworks.

## About

Tanmay Vaij is a Full Stack & AI Engineer specializing in GenAI, scalable backends, and modern web development. With experience across AgriTech, HealthTech, and FinTech sectors, Tanmay builds production-ready applications that solve real-world problems.

**Core Expertise:**
- Full-stack development with React, Next.js, and Node.js
- AI/ML integration using Gemini API, LangChain, and OpenAI
- Cloud infrastructure and DevOps with AWS and Docker
- Mobile development with React Native
- Database design with PostgreSQL and MongoDB

## Professional Experience

### IntellAxis AI (July 2025 - Present)
**Software Developer** | Remote
- Leading development of GenAI products across UI/UX, backend, and DevOps
- Integrated GenAI capabilities and optimized CI/CD pipelines
- Technologies: GenAI, CI/CD, DevOps

### MyLegacyBox (June 2023 - May 2025)
**Full Stack Developer** | Remote
- Led end-to-end development for personal finance succession management platform
- Published React Native app with 1,000+ downloads on Google Play Store
- Built secure backend with PostgreSQL and AWS infrastructure
- Technologies: React Native, Node.js, AWS, PostgreSQL

### SystemOnSilicon (Jan 2023 - June 2023)
**Full Stack Developer** | Remote
- Developed UI/UX designs and full-stack features for AgriTech and HealthTech applications
- Enhanced user experience and system performance
- Technologies: React, Node.js, UI/UX Design

## Technical Skills

### Frontend Development
- React, Next.js, TypeScript
- Tailwind CSS, Shadcn UI
- Angular, React Native

### Backend Development
- Node.js, Express, NestJS
- Python, FastAPI
- PostgreSQL, MongoDB

### DevOps & Cloud
- Docker containerization
- AWS (EC2, Load Balancers, S3)
- GitHub Actions, Jenkins
- CI/CD pipelines

### AI & Machine Learning
- Gemini API integration
- LangChain framework
- OpenAI API
- Agent frameworks and RAG systems

## Featured Projects

### DiaFlow
**Lightweight AI agent framework for Gemini models**
- Published npm package with 100% TypeScript
- Built-in memory, tool calling, and structured outputs
- Simpler alternative to LangChain for production apps
- Technologies: TypeScript, Gemini API, Zod
- GitHub: https://github.com/tanmayvaij/diaflow

### MyLegacyBox
**Finance succession platform with 1K+ downloads**
- Led full-stack development for 2 years
- React Native app on Google Play Store
- Built secure backend with PostgreSQL and AWS
- Technologies: React Native, PostgreSQL, AWS
- Play Store: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.oiconomos.www

### ContainRX
**Self-hosted container management for DevOps teams**
- Open-source modular web app
- Simplifies Docker workflows for developers
- Built with Next.js and modern DevOps practices
- Technologies: Next.js, Docker, DevOps
- GitHub: https://github.com/shaasium/containrx

## Technical Blog

Writing about:
- **AWS Infrastructure**: Application Load Balancer setup, EC2 instance deployment
- **Docker & Containers**: Essential commands, container fundamentals
- **Full-Stack Development**: Best practices, architecture patterns
- **AI/ML Integration**: Building production-ready AI applications

Recent articles:
- AWS Application Load Balancer Setup Guide
- How to Launch AWS EC2 Instance Guide
- Essential Docker Commands Cheat Sheet
- Understanding Docker Containers for Beginners

## Technologies Used in This Portfolio

- **Framework**: Next.js 16 with App Router
- **Styling**: Tailwind CSS with custom design system
- **UI Components**: Shadcn UI, Framer Motion
- **Content**: Markdown-based blog with syntax highlighting
- **SEO**: Comprehensive Open Graph, JSON-LD structured data
- **Analytics**: Google Analytics integration
- **Deployment**: Optimized for Vercel/AWS
